tour.title: Japan Tour Packages Unveiled: Osaka to Tokyo & Beyond
tour.subtitle: 7 days • 2N Osaka • 4N Tokyo • Bullet Train • Mt. Fuji

itinerary.title: Arrival in Osaka – Dotonbori Lights
itinerary.description: Konnichiwa! Settle in, then dive into the city of food and neon. Your first taste of Japan's hospitality.

itinerary.title: Osaka Castle & Culinary Walk
itinerary.description: Step back in time at the legendary castle, then guided tour through samurai history and local flavors.

itinerary.title: Bullet Train to Tokyo
itinerary.description: Marvel at the Shinkansen—comfort, speed, views. Arrive in Tokyo where old meets new.

itinerary.title: Timeless Tokyo: Meiji & Beyond
itinerary.description: Luxury guided city tour. Peaceful Meiji Shrine, then the electric energy of Shibuya.

itinerary.title: Mt. Fuji & Hakone
itinerary.description: Deluxe coach to 5th Station, buffet lunch with sacred peak views. Japan's natural wonder.

itinerary.title: Your Tokyo Discovery
itinerary.description: Free day: Ginza luxury, teamLab Planets, or hidden alleys. Your choice, perfectly free.

itinerary.title: Sayonara with Memories
itinerary.description: Breakfast, transfer to airport. Leave with the heart of Japan, not just photos.

inclusions: Guided tours: Osaka Castle, Tokyo, Mt. Fuji 5th Station

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: We value your privacy at EJI and are committed to protecting your data. This Privacy Policy outlines how we store, use, and collect your data when you visit our site and utilize our services. By visiting our site, you consent to the provisions of this policy.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We gather various information to enhance your experience and upgrade our services. These include:
items: Personal Data: When you sign up for an account, place an order, or subscribe to our newsletter, we gather information like your name, phone number, email address, and billing/shipping address.

Payment Information: When you place an order, we gather payment information like credit/debit card numbers. However, we utilize secure third-party payment processors, so we don't store your complete payment information.
Browsing Information: We gather non-personal information like IP addresses, browser type, device information, and cookies to know how you browse our website.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the data we collect for many different reasons, such as:
items: Processing payments and delivering orders.
Customer service and responding to questions.
Sending newsletters, promotions, and announcements (you may opt-out anytime).
Improving our site, services, and user experience.
Ensuring security and anti-fraud measures.
Meeting legal requirements.

sections.heading: Sharing Your Information
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your information to third parties. We do, however, share your data in the following circumstances:
items: Service Providers: We work with trusted partners to process payments, ship orders, and enhance our services.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law to comply with legal processes or to protect our rights.
Business Transfers: In a merger, acquisition, or sale of your business, your information might be transferred to the new company.
Marketing and Advertising: We can utilize anonymized data to refine our advertising efforts and make the user experience better.

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: Cookies assist us in making your experience on our site better. These are text files, small in size, saved on your device to remember your preferences and monitor your browsing history. We utilize cookies for:
items: Website functionality and performance improvement.
Determining how users use our site.
Providing personalized content and recommendations.
sections.note: You may have your browser settings modified to disable cookies, but this will impair website functionality.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We treat security seriously and undertake several precautions to secure your data, including:
items: Encryption for sensitive data protection.
Secure servers with restricted access to personal information.
Constant monitoring for unauthorized access prevention.
Two-step verification for account protection.
Scheduled security checks for detecting and patching loopholes.
sections.note: Even then, we can't ensure absolute security through internet transmission of data.

sections.heading: Your Rights and Choices
items: Access, update, or delete your personal information.
Opt out of marketing messages.
Switch off cookies from your browser preferences.
Request information on how we process your data.
Withdraw consent for data processing where permitted.

sections.heading: Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our site may link to third-party websites. These sites have privacy policies, and we have no control over them. We suggest you review their policies before you provide your information.

sections.heading: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not designed for users under 13. We do not collect information from children knowingly. If we find that a child has given us information, we will make efforts to delete it.

sections.heading: International Data Transfers
sections.content: If you visit our website from outside of [Your Country], your data could be transferred and processed in a country with laws on data protection different from those in your country. You agree to such a transfer by using our services.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We can change this Privacy Policy periodically to adapt to changes in our services or law. We will post the updated changes on this page with an effective date. We suggest that you read this policy regularly.
